name: Mr. and Mrs. Conrad MOCK, Appellants, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL RESOURCES

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
MONTEMURO, J., participates by designation as a senior judge as provided by Pa.R.J.A. 701(f).
parties: Mr. and Mrs. Conrad MOCK, Appellants, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL RESOURCES.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
MONTEMURO, J., participates by designation as a senior judge as provided by Pa.R.J.A. 701(f).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John A. VanLuvanee, Doylestown, for Mr. & Mrs. Conrad Mock.
Ronald M. Agulnick, West Chester, amicus curiae National Assn, of Home Builders.
Louden L. Campbell, Harrisburg, for Builders Assn.
Martha Blasberg, Conshohocken, for Department of Environmental Resources.
casebody.head_matter:
667 A.2d 212
Mr. and Mrs. Conrad MOCK, Appellants, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL RESOURCES.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 24, 1995.
Decided Nov. 22, 1995.
John A. VanLuvanee, Doylestown, for Mr. & Mrs. Conrad Mock.
Ronald M. Agulnick, West Chester, amicus curiae National Assn, of Home Builders.
Louden L. Campbell, Harrisburg, for Builders Assn.
Martha Blasberg, Conshohocken, for Department of Environmental Resources.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
